game.name: HORDEKILL Deluxe Edition Upgrade
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원
game.shortDescription: The HORDEKILL Deluxe Edition Upgrade includes the five exclusive weapons, three exclusive cosmetics (player skins) and twenty exclusive elite offerings.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The HORDEKILL Deluxe Edition Upgrade includes the five exclusive weapons, three exclusive cosmetics (player skins) and twenty exclusive elite offerings.
